name: app.py
content: from shiny import App, Inputs, Outputs, Session, reactive, render, ui # We need to import here so ShinyLive doesn't get upset. import numpy, certifi, branca, xyzservices import folium def server(input: Inputs, output: Outputs, session: Session): pass app_ui = ui.page_fluid( ui.panel_title(ui.HTML('Heatmapper')), ui.layout_sidebar( ui.sidebar( ui.HTML("Data Format"), id="SidebarPanel", width=200 ), ui.navset_tab( ui.nav_panel( "Interactive", folium.Map((45.5236, -122.6750), tiles="cartodb positron") ), ui.nav_panel( "Table", ), ), ) ) app = App(app_ui, server)
